bio:
I enjoy writing fiction and creatively, and I have a passion for the romance and fantasy genres.

I have experience working under deadline pressure. In addition to always customizing my work to the needs of my clients, I am happy to produce changes as needed. All of my work is totally original, and I proofread it all by hand and using a variety of software programs. I will conduct research gladly and respond quickly. My working language is English, and I am a very organized individual.

Long or short term project work is welcome, and I would be happy to form recurrent business relationships. If you cannot find an appropriate sample of my work online, kindly get in touch with me. I would be pleased to give suitable, compensated samples.

I will gladly follow your instructions and build our company to suit your needs. Although I am at ease with all kinds of contact, I do prefer email or Skype conferences.

To prevent misunderstandings, all discussions will be confirmed in writing by email, and all modifications, corrections, and specifications must be sent via email before I finish the work. This is to make sure that you receive exactly what you want.

abstrac: Why stop? Why did you start...
bio:
As a PHP Laravel developer at Zactra, I bring a wealth of expertise and experience to our team. With a passion for developing high-quality web applications, I am committed to delivering solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients.

I have a deep understanding of PHP and the Laravel framework, which allows me to develop robust and scalable web applications quickly and efficiently. My experience in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript also enables me to create user-friendly and intuitive interfaces that engage users and provide a seamless experience.

At Zactra, I collaborate closely with clients and other team members to understand project requirements, identify opportunities for improvement, and deliver solutions that exceed expectations. I am constantly learning and exploring new technologies to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in web development.

I take pride in my work and strive to deliver high-quality solutions that help our clients achieve their goals. Whether it's developing a custom web application from scratch or maintaining an existing one, I am dedicated to providing exceptional service and delivering results that drive business success.
I am flexible to work with London from 9 AM to 5 PM and I don't work apart from it unless any emergency came. So please make sure to work on the mentioned hours.

Tayyiba was very efficient, cordial, and very open to making whatever changes I needed for this project. I recommend her to anyone who needs a "great" eBook written. I will definitely utilize her services again. Thank you, Tabz! You were excellent!

abstrac: Effective Content Writing+ Insightful Creative + Professionally Produced = BSK Content Writing.
bio:
Welcome to BSK content writing, a digital marketing agency that helps businesses make their brands more visible online by creating engaging content and social presence that helps them grow their business.

I am Tayyiba & I am a content writer and Digital marketing specialist. I started freelancing in 2015 after my first son was born. At that time, I was looking for something that could make me feel happy and satisfied. After years of experience & learning, I realized I have a great passion for writing, and it led me to the idea of creating the brand BSKcontentwriting.

I’ve worked on several different projects, from creating buyer personas to analyzing SWOTs and coming up with strategies for how to approach the market for your product. I am very detail-oriented, and I always make sure that my work is up to the highest standards. If you are interested in hiring me for any project, please let me know.Now What BSK stands for?

BSK stands for a short version of my husband’s name. I created this brand because he’s been an incredible motivator throughout the year of creating it.

So What is BSK Content Writing?

BSK content writing is a digital agency that specializes in creating content for small businesses. We help businesses create compelling, persuasive, and engaging content for their websites, blogs, and social media channels.

We’re extremely proud to be an independent business, which means we have total control over what we do and how we do it. Our clients are always at the heart of everything we do, and we focus on building strong relationships with them so they can keep coming back to us in the future. We work hard to deliver quality work that meets client expectations every time.

Why BSKContentwriting

The internet has changed the way we live our lives—and the way we run our businesses. If you want your brand to be seen online, you need quality content that reflects your company’s values and goals. That’s where BSK content writing comes in!

We understand that each business has its unique set of needs and goals regarding its digital presence, which is why we offer a broad range of services, including Content Writing, Copy Writing, SEO optimization, Keyword research, EBook writing, and more!
